name: Makurai
description:
Made for 2 jams: Bullet Hell Jam and Black&White Jam

This is my attempt to make a game that fullfills two jams at once.

Makurai is an online PVP bullet hell game where you control an auto-firing hero with your mouse (or touch), and you must avoid all enemy bullets that bounces on walls.

The first who get hit loses!

For Bullet Hell Jam: I did not directly follow the "10 seconds" theme, but most of the fights will not last much more than that

For B&2 Jam: I followed the b) rule "Only uses the colors in the greyscale of black and white"

INSTRUCTIONS

- Create a lobby (if no lobbies are preset)
or Click on a lobby name to join that lobby.

The battle will automatically start when 2 players enter the lobby.

Have fun!
